adjectives.description: archy (comparative more archy, superlative most archy)

entries.meaning: Resembling an arch; having arches; arched; arching
(anarchism, usually derogatory) A political theory or practice that supports hierarchy and authority; the opposite of anarchy.
examples: If archy in all forms has brought mankind grief, it follows that the remedy is repudiation. The repudiation of archy is anarchy. Anarchy is therefore the goal of freedom-seeking mankind. Whoever seeks freedom, advances anarchy.
